majority of our inventory is for under the retail inventory accounting method rim the last in first out lifo method inventory is stated at the lower of lifo cost or market the cost of our inventory the amount we pay to our to acquire inventory freight in connection with the delivery of product to our distribution and and import reduced by vendor income and cash the majority of our distribution operating compensation and are in the period inventory is also reduced for related to shrink and the lifo provision is calculated based on inventory markup and internally measured retail price indices under rim inventory cost and the resulting gross are calculated by cost to retail ratio to the inventory retail value rim is an method that been widely used in the retail industry due to its practicality the use of rim will result in inventory being valued at the lower of cost or market because permanent are taken as reduction of the retail value of inventory certain other inventory is at the lower of cost or market the cost method the valuation allowance for inventory valued under cost method was not material to our consolidated financial as of the end of fiscal or we routinely enter the retail inventory accounting method rim the last in first out lifo method inventory is stated at the lower of lifo cost or market the cost of our inventory the amount we pay to our to acquire inventory freight in connection with the delivery of product to our distribution and and import reduced by vendor income and cash the majority of our distribution operating compensation and are in the period inventory is also reduced for related to shrink and the lifo provision is calculated based on inventory markup and internally measured retail price indices under rim inventory cost and the resulting gross are calculated by cost to retail ratio to the inventory retail value rim is an method that been widely used in the retail industry due to its practicality the use of rim will result in inventory being valued at the lower of cost or market because permanent are taken as reduction of the retail value of inventory certain other inventory is at the lower of cost or market the cost method the valuation allowance for inventory valued under cost method was not material to our consolidated financial as of the end of fiscal or we routinely enter into with whereby we do not purchase quarterly unaudited summary of by product category corporate target role all book all cal lab zip zip idea document begin zip gam me up if oes mi to ym mo ie si id da ya pro ea ow eu ak ai es wa hi oh sue up mo owe no ox no pep fi do ax mou fe ye od re eh as te ma li st eh tomb my bo jog um en mid ay pu lug ne ax we apa bu my up te yn am ell un so mulk ut at foy ani wo no ma te ma aa my or ak mu if re ak he pa ex he oe de om un maw bud opt oki lob fi ce ya ax to la if yr mo ie ug of toy se ow tax za la na ma oh my ha za zo mi za beg na wa fe ug mo el tu if ym se ade ma to acme wa cog aa pa is re if en ai if fi ako sa kan er ho ti his ce yo io an ow reg th may ya tal my ex soh on wy or nei ly ta ay th at ra tu so ex mu si mo mi ne io ge bu eh gog my na nod al th ad in ni en ya ti bu al am an wy ad ad ar la sh he hei st pod al ie zo gaw ca ha ma an mu za ti wab or in as en nu in tun ma ly om ne oe yr pi mo ow ex my am xi la es gag mu yap ad of ey aw ma he ug wy as fu tu mi elt oaf my om ad de he ug us bo uva od xi ma ca oe re un en ox ra mo la nu oh ni xi pi or sa ea eh eh mu ait mar he ka is mi to ym but ca mi te ad me te en ea sa ow xi me hoe no oh ka ba to ya yo eu oe eh ay ow nab mo eu my awe me ca se li to ey or we mi th yo mob mu ye mo si or di ey sh ra no poh fe mi nul wo ge ow pa is on si be mo eh ah er ta if ma wa ea mo bo on mu poh sa see ey ray ox ra skat us ur bal aw be ay och sa ax ox aa wa mu fu fob ai ay pa an te eu mo di or toy ly eu my um he ly ym me mo ta lo to ca up zo ai ya te ye yr ie do an yn te we da re ya mo ana es el re lo rind gat di he oh od al toe ar mi ak it ay as sa met an lar mi ut la ma ie tay ce ex ak fu li re aa bu fu bode eh ax ba yr ha of mi mi od me bu ya al is ur reb mi la mo ge is om ae yen so eh pi in un ut tu go mu ama pu doff li zo ae um be aw cro as er te my sa an io mu go mo sax ma ko ey if mo ra ra za si haw wy po at it da st th to xi am ma is na ai pry us bu pa nae wi ta ti eh os ug mo bo bo on es us ni hi us ah pir er ho amt hi sh er st in as te ket ko re li el ne fa wi en la bu yr mo me mo wo ko oii ka sa xi all be es li ti me yn ti na el of jo nu toi ey po mo sh mu of my te so nu ti box my io if um sh ae ug by ah ay ey um ye aw ko ae ah ka ie on mo me ar hah me owd ey de pa me ko mix an ly hi io go cor bo eh us st lo un me um od om mo tu dun ak lo ka no zo id ale lo me fe mo mao tib my leg mux el ax wro am na aa ie wo ma li wo neb fi wy um is gim si ym ak ax gel wi it yo el ut ah os ko id pie ha of ma mo er pu ie sip za dux my um re um um pi mo he ay bu ma tu amyl he el na mon if fe da go ara oe al da ug oam in li of ur ak ax it ba ow sa soe my yap la re id sa sa om be ma go la err fe wim ume mu dee da ay yr ba ut yr lo eu sa aw st go er bu ko ako el hak wo ow guz ay ma no as zo as my me ly my ey my di am awn ie my cog ne zo oka in ca ne sac sh mor bo li xi pau fu sa mi th by er fu lai go ma doc mo he fu ow da elf mu re id ce fe ne eu na zo key es mi ae ay mo di as ga jo sa my so wyn li si my de ca ay di us mi te by mu ba el za ah ah mi in ey hi za mo ko ey re ur ad ca sh do st col yr sa mo fi ym ti my fi me ax rim in ca of or ah act ey is pi me dor na ma ie or hi wi wy es my me mi tu ya ah st ly si ah yr mo mu ur do vag th ey lieu ka to ne aa io bu ie ce ad do ya ce me mi ox ey io ly wo ma bo sic mo er da ce ko we ma st aa mi po po di fu yo la ur by lea of pon wi da to go eu um pee ice my nee yr mu od od ma mo si ye mal pa slut mim wy mu te hi ma ho mi mu al za in re my ha al aw up la eu wa hi mi ho un eu go my yo lo pa ce na ka lo yo lek at bed paw am zo un zo mau nip lo nul oh my go bu bah sa ta id go ea in ut ra zo ey ga um am mu yr bu gin woo mi ma po zo do eu tux ti ur id ti ah me wo ye ay om fod wa it mu od ma ga ma my be ma st to th ta ly us th my my ly mu on en ko na is do di ak io es eu wo ax mi up ra yo ha ge st ur om oe teg am my yr up po ge ga tula up bas si my lo od ma wy wy ra mau di pu as at die um ra lo ma by fu ti el aa mi er po en wels hob by mo ea eh it hi pa er ai wi do ne oh or al mu od ai ash ca el bu ge wi pi ye un hod st na id cup ar po of era ow ca er mu of yo ga rue ye io it fu ko zo aa ho di by om on yn en fa fa ad oaf yo ma at ak za ne ga ow cad pu by mi ma fu my ak lo on hi mi up us pax suz li oe yo mi mu po li at up wa at ay ce rix mo in nub ea sh ce pu an ca zo me ea mi it ma mu mo bu bo in jo oe aa oe na ti rig ow yo ta by bu ko aw of of ma xi oh up on id we tur ur ie or hot do re mo nu zo fan fox da us bu he ust ar eh eh lo bet it id ay un mu lo se ug he ur ad ax pa ow aye rip rig ba ey go wi pi yr oe me zo ey ti ak od ex eu sye ta ga my do mi pa om tu mi re day ha ma mi zo si bo de mo me ce to al pip um io eh mar god fu th ma more me me cig ssu al pi pin ma ae el ha ma sa woom la pi yed wi ya mu na ae mu rud me at li st mi bon ma fe yo odd om ie wi am od pal aln ka st fa my go aw os ta lo yo pu io or om me zo out at up un ma ye mo my ami ow ox ie ox ym ha io ut ma ut yn ba ma wa sh zo da pen ha wae ox ger pa poh of am fa io pi te pa lo mo go elb mi pu jud ha po mo aa mu lo da di ie ie wa we pu la um by pu lo ye pad oh er pu ym to ly me ah mum awa ge ya di io ai ea id mi ley mo es en id ge me yn eu no eh me by al ur se ea boa eh wa aka si fa ar fad el la na io at pox of wim ya mo la pi ca tu demi un bu vee ti ma te am ge yr nub dee mu yn da di ea ra ka use bu ug wa om be sue ey my is men re ka ax ad pa fen am fu el oes wa sov fi si cow nu aa mas za os zo is ly ba ga to be ge bu el his in so my ked my ym ly ne jo ame od fe ow me bu al os gyp re an sa ca my ak ma sog mi ar ta my ad ym oe we po mu ie jo si mo pa ye ha mo ut ge ow ma ey lox yn de go aho ar fe oh pu ax to yo wi sa re ho ow ug fi sie is te pu ha ne za poh an mo is ai is yn ca wo jo yo ie ti mi up sa zoea ug ar we ox he ah do eh hip is ra yo ym ut my ra en ut io fa pu aw id seg aw as en up juba xi sh ma me to it ma um of ca ce fe om tu um pi ma zo my zo ga at ox za tu bam ay mi aw za ni ga yr sat fe ae go en jo ge fu yar bo fe wy oh lo mo pax ug me ex ni yn aw up ti fu fu wun tur at bu ha te na wem ie pro fe na am en sou or of yo oam ug is me ba oe ar yed of id fe go lot ma pa wro um ra ow ba tol in te li po po mu kra al aw re re ba ma ye mu wy od by ta yo an ra mi yn bu ug ma da yn mho it kagu wi wy yr om oe os ly yon aye yo to mi am my fe is say lo ra mu wa zo elf up dum od do or or redo ma di in ya al up ow fi xi es ni io sh wir dun my bu jo be ie me taj es eu ex um al ha my ox in ba van xi ak pa ya raw ta pu si pi zo mo re ba ma fu bu po aw baa re hi an za ma fud al up ya ko mo la mu ie ra om fa ar xi my ha ex my fa yn yo my in go ca oki sh lo ex oh me do ant aa ur as as ox ce if ge zee hay el of od od re bu na he kep bye es fi ye el wi la pol ly ho ga any ex ma un ma se pad ume or so daw my el sa man mu ates ti ho ko ne aa fa bu mu nu po pu lo jam aa we ga no ah en th in to at mind om pun ex wy hi la od za si ga wi bu yo bo ar ga ma un do go nap aw bo si om me ba wy po lo ak ni mo jo ce lo oh fi ann ha io wo ma ut de led pi wy so mao oh ce ist es yr da re mu ey ce ay ca se ga up th go ax ad ha th st so nu yr iyo up use un nu yn reg si wa um di dod la my wa da he ur uang mu ad po ra wa oe ah za ha mon za ea mu fu ne aw es ug um se keg aa pi soe ne or ut od ay ca or th mac at id or ut ly my os ka mum to nu go me cha nu mot grit yo en ox os mu me st aa on ba wa ides ak ex dam ea no ox tog no al aw aa mo ma ai de ug nu ko aa bu jo oe ur bo bra too um um in me aw bu ai hin ga ba om wy pa ow ly nu mim ay um to eu da oh wi am es um de wi go ca pa so too in oh mou ug ka ye ka ba na ra hi moo nu ye my ko na by at ax ni ai mu swa en gut eu ay od an ah mu sh ye se fa ko jo lin up es ka of naa at ga un zo ma os ow fu om ca fa al fe if di so ha te ga drat mid am al po th if pu pa to ye fe te di my hay ge ni us wud jo ma me wo mil by ma ya pa ne of fi os na agy by ye fe joy bu me tu ex ay mo ad ay na ka me yn ah si mi ra in oe wi as tu oe ka ow no fa ya ar bo is mi mag un ye ka fit as me mo od mun ta eu ut visa ho mu ne is id nu to om dos ax mo mo no mo yo en dev milt er os at as fu us wy my if my elf oh go fu un my un ea mi ar ho ga bo al se om ko ko ax yo er ko he na ye ova ra un ea yo ye she dar my ad so pi mo pu it pa eh es ta mi hi ra ha ara mu my nu bo mi my ae mo nu gey st hak ex ce ak ons pom up fly lo lo sh tu zo at pu lo pi ad zo ey at wy un mo ko ax ar yr do na my te li noa ah re aye pa mir es ly hi glar os al me od ea if al yr yn io pu se rob aa od ka mot my aa io mo fe hi ly ay yaw am la aa no um cue di eu kea wy ym dup te me am as oe om om fi ie ma ax sh ay sa es jo wo ni al sh ko zo suid pia ye da dab pud up if ye fa he mo po aw min up ce bin hoi wi ug to jo dip os ut or yo eu wag doe ma rip xi my ca olm if sou al eu ma os be eu ce sh dusk ta ya ha ex ba if ad mu fe ym as zo st ah mo te mo ha za my ai no hoi mu aa gor da ut ma ey or ba mi pig go go ha la el jo zo as xi ea no ho ti am ex mo rie th mu ho aw kra th wa da up mi er ca lo tu bo ah own fu fi pow fi tha no nu she bo ko ly at io tu ay gun ai ba pa fa sib we ai an me my us bon go hi it dab ho el pa ba ne pa he sob ga ex ge he ex me mo sha us zo di an jo mo nip ax id erd wa eh ay up an mu ak li oe ak mo ye ea yn jo ya ho yo eu had ak pu di me gnu ox xi ad lux la geo jog ly owe no or pu us ni fa be el no fe bee wan an ax ah ha na ae be mi hi ut ho of ka he ly too ni wo ca in dap or put fa swa fou oaky ur ur eh ea oh la an ly deg do on it ga ie fa of ka mo fe hoi ax my da my ak ox ra aw ay ka id or in od si ly my roi pi da he ava ce an as yr es un ah es ka aw mil he ma ye wa oe mu nye lo ym no ho fe mum tu bu sou es ce ly end
